features: Mild colors are perfect for note-taking, underlining, highlighting, drawing and more
Versatile 2-in-1 chisel tip lets you quickly change between precise and broad lines
No-bleed ink keeps your work looking clean
body.description: Ignite your imagination with Sharpie S-Note creative markers. Versatile and fun, they’re both a marker and a highlighter, adding a splash of color to note-taking, underlining, highlighting, drawing and more. Versatility is the name of the game with a chisel tip that lets you quickly switch between precise and broad lines. Plus, the no-bleed ink keeps your work looking clean. Unleash your creativity with Sharpie S-Note!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Perfect for notes, highlighting, underlining, illustrations, and more 2-in-1 chisel tip lets you switch between precise and broad lines No-bleed ink keeps work looking clean Available in 36 creative colors Easily convert packaging into stand-up easel for easy access Sharpie S-Note Creative Markers It's a marker. It's a highlighter. It's both! It’s Sharpie S-Note Creative Markers! Color-code your notes, make your highlighting and underlining stand out, or create colorful drawings—your imagination is the limit. With a versatile chisel tip, you’ll be able to switch between precise and broad lines to bring your notes to life. Finally, the no-bleed ink keeps your beautiful work looking clean and eye-catching. What creativity do you have up your sleeve? Find out with Sharpie S-Note.

One Part Marker, One Part Highlighter Unleash Your Creativity Sharpie S-Note Creative Markers help you make note-taking fun! Soft colors are perfect for bullet journaling and creative accenting. Get Versatile The 2-in-1 chisel tip lets you quickly switch between precise and broad lines so you can add intricate details or fill in big areas. Keep It Clean Sharpie S-Note has no-bleed ink that won't go through your paper, allowing you to create eye-catching illustrations and keep your writing legible. Mild Colors Use these creative markers to highlight, color-code, take notes, underline, or create colorful drawings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for coloring!
reviews.reviewText: I bought these to color with but I can definitely see how versatile they can be with how pigmented yet pastel the colors are, they can be used as highlighters. Sharpie is always a good brand. These are water based! Not permanent ink like the original sharpie markers that are alcohol based. These have no smell and don’t bleed! I am coloring in the brand “ Brain Games color by number “ (butterfly) spiral coloring book and the pages are a little bit thicker than regular printer paper. ZERO bleed through which is fantastic for coloring books! These can bleed through if the paper is thin like in bibles or on regular lined paper but still good for note taking, highlighting and or coloring. The only dislike I have is the lines I see in coloring in larger pieces, but that comes with any colored markers to be honest. I will be buying the SNote duo markers next!The packaging it came in isn’t bad but I will be buying a pencil case to hold them, the flimsy plastic case it came in is not my favorite.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Their super cute and the colors are like a pastel shade. You can write and highlight things with them. Except the yellow it's hard to see on paper but only if your writing with it, highlighting things is easy to see. They make writing fun and have lost of ink!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile, bold, bleed proof, pretty
reviews.reviewText: These are my new favorite markers. I love these Sharpies, they are beautiful. I enjoy the look of these bright pastel shades. The ink is pigmented and shows up well on paper. I specifically like that they do not bleed through. They are very versatile, I like to use them for highlighting, journaling, coloring with my kids, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Colorful and Great! Highly Recommend.
reviews.reviewText: Just got these and I am very happy with them. So far each color has come out clean, did not smudge my ink, and they work wonderfully in notebooks. These made a great addition to my stationary collection for my planners and main notebooks. The tips of the markers are firm. Not too dry nor over following with ink either.I'm also odd and like to place labels on the sides of my markers to color-code in my notebooks. Happy to say that the plastic they're made out of takes to the adhesive just fine. :)The packaging the markers come in make a neat container to store them away for later.If you are looking to get a new set of colors to add some pop into your day to day of note taking, journaling, bullet journaling, or school defiantly try these. I've tired the Zebra ones similar to these and I am leaning more to these just for the convince of the selection of colors in one spot but also the chiseled tip of the marker too. The solidness makes it easier to glide along the page. They are fun to color in doodles on the sides of pages too. :pGot them on sale too.5/5

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Markers - But very light color
reviews.reviewText: As a lover of all things Sharpie when these went on sale I wanted to give them a try. Love the pastel colors but some of the lighter shades are a little harder to read but may work ok for doodling. I do like how you can use these on a sharp point for a pen style writing or at the larger flat size for more of a marker look.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for the purpose of highlighting notes for school, but I wanted something different than traditional neon highlighter colors. This pack offers a nice range of pretty pastels that serve the purpose of highlighting. Downside is that when highlighting over pen, the sharpie causes the pen to bleed - but I feel like that happens with lots of highlighters

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such great markets
reviews.reviewText: These sharpies are a really great marker. They make nice clear clean lines. The colors do not run. So it gives you the sharp color of a thick sharpie but the versatility for thin lines

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I loveeee these as highlighters, all colors are sheer enough to see what you’ve highlighted and you get a great variety of colors which is great for organizing. These are my go tos for tax season
Très beau crayon de belle couleur le seul défaut il n’y a de couleur noire

Para ser rápido,estos plumones tienen una versatilidad impresionante,colores muy bonitos y brillantes,algunos son muy fuertes como el color ciruela, que puede tapar el texto escrito o impreso,solo tengo 2 problemas:1:su tapa:más bien el cerrado de la misma,ya qua,su cierre es muy poco fuerte y puede destaparse y secarse si no tienes cuidado, aunque esto se arregla si presionas la tapa para que cierre bien,pero eso podría dañar el plumón a largo plazo,rompiendo la tapa o la parte donde cierra.Y2:el empaquetado:al menos ami,el empaque llegó en muy mal estado,roto de varios lados,de la parte inferior abierto y de los lados como si alguien los hubiera abierto muy bruscamente,esto no daño a los plumones, simplemente daño a tan bonito empaque.Aunque no todo es malo,los colores y la punta son perfectos,ya que con ellos puedes hacer unos apuntes PRECIOSOS,también puedes empezar con estos plumones en el mundo del lettering gracias a qué con su punta puedes hacer el trazo grueso y delgado y alternar entre los dos de forma rápida y sin perder mucho tiempo y tintaTambién los conseguí a un precio envidiable, $360 pesos MX, simplemente para la calidad tan superior respecto su precio es perfectos para todosEn resumen:son plumones muy bonitos,con buena punta y con colores hermoso y principalmente,la razón principal de su venta es su VERSATILIDAD.

Me encanta la calidad de Sharpie, son perfectos para lettering, para pintar, para tomar notas, no se chorreando y cada color es el correspondiente.Hago mucho trabajo en el computador pero cuando escribo en papel estos plumones son super eficientes. Funcionan como marca textos también sin traspasarse de las hojas. Totalmente recomendable 😃🙌
